channel.title: Forming glitch clan (RSPS)
channel.description:
I love to glitch in rspsses and I would love to form up team that goes and finds all those lovely little bugs. I already know quite lot, but more heads thinking is always better than one :). If your intrested add me zeropointxx in skype.
Requirements: I don't want anybody that doesn't know any glitches at all but wants to know them, then your not in right thread. Also I recommend you know some basic java becouse some glitches require coding simple stuff in java.

item.title: Forming glitch clan (RSPS)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

The thing is that it is a stupid idea, what is the point of manipulating bugs in a server? What will it get you and what is the point of doing it? It just sounds like a waste of time and effort and in reality finding a bug is only fun for the first 2 minutes before you get bored. It is really childish and shouldn’t even be discussed, if you believe someone would be interested then pm them personally rather then making a pointless topic. You are only going to get flamed because of how ridiculousness this idea is, stop blaming the people who reply.

Read full topic

item.title: Forming glitch clan (RSPS)
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

I wish I understood what I am doing wrong. If somebody makes bot for rsps everybody is against it, same goes for glitch clan. If I like exploiting private servers like I do in runescape aswell whats problem?

And no I am not kiddo, I am 19 year old.
Now if you are intrested in glitching add me on skype, if not please don’t come here to rage it doesn’t help anybody.

EDIT: And you can’t fix everything in beta, even runescape has so many glitches that its hard to keep in count…

Read full topic

item.title: Forming glitch clan (RSPS)
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:489927”][quote author=zeropointx link=topic=608160.msg4230126#msg4230126 date=1361216108]
I love to glitch in rspsses and I would love to form up team that goes and finds all those lovely little bugs. I already know quite lot, but more heads thinking is always better than one :). If your intrested add me zeropointxx in skype.

Requirements:
I don’t want anybody that doesn’t know any glitches at all but wants to know them, then your not in right thread. Also I recommend you know some basic java becouse some glitches require coding simple stuff in java.
[/quote]

Glitches require NO java experience what so ever. That’d be considered hacking.
Glitch: A sudden, usually temporary malfunction or irregularity of equipment: “a computer glitch”.

Plus, 9/10 servers will ban you for abuse if it’s not reported.

Lastly:

[quote author=Clawz fury link=topic=608160.msg4230721#msg4230721 date=1361249281]
no…
[/quote][/quote]
In runescape this is true. However since rsps is coded so badly hacking leads to several glitches… And that hacking is SO easy that even child can do it, I wouldn’t even call it hacking.

Overall servers rarely ban you becouse somebody reported you and these glitches are usually hard to spot by random people. If you however get banned becouse of server logs just make new account or change ip?

Overall this is very offtopic and I can’t understand why you hate this idea so much?

Read full topic

Glitch: A sudden, usually temporary malfunction or irregularity of equipment: “a computer glitch”.

Plus, 9/10 servers will ban you for abuse if it’s not reported.
